text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã meneprñnewãtẽ
slm͂mewe pñnuteh tideimi sehuwetẽne
title: TL 12

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnawu mẽneprñnawatẽ
hanadaza hrppiladi
ehbi setideime
title: TL 53

text:
ebẽñne prñnawã mẽtiprñnawatẽ χluwãnimi hrppiladi ehbi setideime
ehbije ẽnẽperikelhe χñtawata
title: TL 67

text:
ebeñnẽ χupã mene prñnawatẽ
sbikaza χñtanubeh tideimi
temusemutah tuhes
title: TL 70

text: ebẽñnẽ prñnawãmẽne prñnawatẽ χudrehila hrppiladi ehbi
title: TL 73

text: ebẽñnẽ prñnawã mẽtiprñnawatẽ pertinamuwa hrppiladi ehbi setideime ehbije
title: TL 66

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã mẽtiprñnawatẽ esedeplẽmi
hrppiladi ehbi setideime ehbije humelije
title: TL 85

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnawã mẽtiprñnawatẽ erimñnuha
semuteh tideimi hrppi atli ehbi sejẽni ehbi
title: TL 86

translations.text: The building belonging to this (monument), Erimñnuha, son of Semute, built it for himself and his mother.

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupu mẽti prñnawatẽ
esete muleseh atli ehbi seladi setideime
title: TL 105

translations.text: This tomb has built Esete, (the child) of Mulese for himself and wife and children.

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã meti prñnawatẽ pumaza ertelijeseh tideimi
hrppiladi ehbi uwiñte χumetijeh zzimazi se tideime ehbije
title: TL 120

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã metiprñnawatẽ erm͂menẽni se
lada ehbi hrppi atla eptte se prñnezi epttehi
title: TL 121

text:
ebẽñni χupã meti prñnawatẽ qañnuwili
qasah hrppi ladi ehbi setideimi
title: N316

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã meti prñnawatẽ zahama ddawãpartah
tideimi meñtepitãti zahãmã se ladã se tideimis ehbis
kbi tike tiñtepitadi atlahi tibe kbijehi
tibete alahaditi mene mãhãi tubeiti
wedrẽñni
title: TL 101

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnãwu metiprñnawatẽ
iχtta hlah tideimi hrppiladi ehbi
setideime ehbije seijetiedi tike mẽtẽ
meneqasttu ẽni qlahi ebijehi sewedri wehñtezi
title: TL 56

text:
ebeis tukedris mepi
tuwetẽ χssbezẽ krupsseh
tideimi sepurihimeteh
tuhes tlãñna atru ehbi
seladu ehbi tikeukẽprẽ
pilleñni urtaqijahñ kbatru
seprijenubehñ tuhesñ
title: TL 25

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã metiprñnawatẽ qñturahi hrppidubeh
tideimi zimasttrah tuhes meijadi tike tihe
zum͂m ... tubeiti muhãi huwedri
title: TL 59

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã mẽneprñnawatẽ tettm͂pe
hñtihãmah tideimi seneñte tãtitdi
isbazi meije nihrppitãtu tike m͂mẽ ladãtije
hrppi ??? tadi tike kbi mẽne
tubidi qlajebi semalija setasa miñtaha
title: TL 75

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnawã mene prñnawatẽ ddaqasa sttuleh
tideimi hrpi ladi ehbi setideime seẽke lati ddaqasa
mene ñtepi tãti ñtipatezi seladã ehbi kbi tike meinipe ñtepi tãtu
tibeinipe hlm͂mi tuwetu hlm͂mi meituweti tike tibei
ñtepi tadi tike mene itlehi tubeiti trm͂mili huwedri
se trqqas semãhãi huwedri
title: TL 88

text:
ebẽñnẽ τezi mẽne ñte tuwetẽ xudalijẽ: murãzah◊ tideimi hrppidem...
...maza seije [...].adi tike mẽtẽ mẽne mahãi tubeiti nelez...
title: TL 72

text: ebẽñnẽ χupã meneprñnawatẽ χudali zuhrijah tideimi χezrimeh prñnezijehi
title: TL 1

translations.text: This tomb, it was built by Χudali, son of Zuhrija, household member of Χezrime.

text: pizziti prñnawate ddepñneweh tideimi hrppi ladi ehbi se tideime
title: TL 98

translations.text: Pizzi has built it, the child of Ddepñnewe, for his wife and the children.

text: ebẽñnẽ χupã mẽtiprñnawatẽ tewinezẽi sppñtazah asawãzalah tideimi hrppi ladi setideime miñti adaijẽ |||-
title: TL 3

translations.text: This tomb has built Tewinezẽi, the son of Sppñtaza (and) Asawãzala, for the wife and the child[ren]. For the miñti (they have established) a quantity of III- ada.

text:
ebẽñn prñnawã metiprñnawatẽ teleχuzi hrpi ladi ehb setideimi
sedi ñta tadẽ tesi miñti aladehali adẽ ||||
title: TL 4

translations.text: This building has built Teleχuzi for his wife and children. And he has established under oath/by (means of) a sworn agreement III ada for the miñti, (namely) for the (purpose of the) allocation(?).

text:
ebẽñnẽ ñtatã meneprñnawãtẽ pulenjda mullijeseh sedapara pulenjdah purihimetehe prñnezijehi hrppi lada epttehe setideime
seije tieseri tadi tike ñtata ebehi
meije tubeiti punamaθθi aladahali ada ∠
title: TL 6

translations.text: This burial chamber have built Pulejnda, (the child) of Mulliese, and Dapara, (the child) of Pulejnda, the household members of Purihimeti, for their wives and the children. Whoever places anybody eseri in this burial chamber - they should destroy everything belonging to him. For the allocation(?) ∠ ada.

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnawã mẽtiprñnawatẽ ddapssmm͂a padrmm͂ah tideimi
hrppi prñnezi ehbi urebillaha trm͂misñ χñtewete teri
arttum͂para sẽtalahhãti miñti adai O-
title: TL 11

translations.text: This building has built Ddapssmm͂a, [the ch]ild of Padrmm͂a, for his household member Urebillaha. When Arttum͂para ruled Lycia. And the miñti shall assign(?) him(?) (to the tomb) for a sum of O- ada.

text: ebẽñnẽ χupã mẽne prñnawatẽ mede epñnẽni ehbi hm͂prãma sejatli
title: TL 37

translations.text: The tomb belonging to this (monument), Mede built itfor his younger brother Hm͂prãma and for himself

text:
ebẽñnẽ χupã meti
prñnawatẽ apñnãtama
hrppi ladi ehbi se tideime
meipñ pudẽ ti ñte
χahba ehbi wazzije kbatra
title: TL 87

text: ebẽñnẽ χupã mẽti prñnawatẽ wazala eppleme tideimi hrppi ladi ehbi se tideime aladahali awasi ada //-
title: TL 16

translations.text: This tomb has built Wazala, the child of Eppleme for his wife and the children. For the allocation(?) (and) for the internment II- ada.

text: ebẽñnẽ χupã mẽti prñnawatẽ ..... emi hrppi ladi ehbi se tideime aladahali awaha.i ... ada /
title: TL 17

translations.text: This tomb has built ...emi for his wife [and] the children. For the allocation(?), (namely/and) for the one who lets down/inters(?), ... ada

text: ebẽñnẽ χupã mẽne prñnawatẽ [.]°azz[.] pẽmudijah tideimi qelehi kumaza hrppi ladi setideime aladahali: ada ||
title: N322

text:
upazijẽne prñnawate
hrppi prñnezi ehbi
seije ñta tãtẽ
tasa miñta meleime
sejaladahali
ada |||-
title: TL 31

translations.text: Upazi has built it for his household. And they have established oaths/sworn agreements of/with the miñti for the approved ones(?) and for the allocation III- ada.

text: ipresida ajẽta..dẽh armanazah tideimi ikuweh tedi se prñnezijehi hrppi ladi ehbi se tideime sejaitẽ awahãi aladahali ada ||
title: N334

translations.text: Ipresida the child of Ajẽta..dẽ (and?) of Armanaza, the father and household member of Ikuwe, for his wife [and] the children. And the ones who let down/inter(?) made/carried out the allocation(?) - II ada (have been established for it).

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnawã mene prñnawatẽ
ahqqadi pizibideh tideimi se
hm͂prãmeh tuhes
seije ñta tadẽ miñti
aladehali ada O- sejẽtri ñtata
ada |||- se pijetẽ hrzzi ñtatã ladi ehbi se mñneτeidehe
esedẽñnewi ) se pijetẽ ẽtri ñtatã prñnezi atlahi
title: TL 36

translations.text: This building has built Ahqqadi, the child of Pizibide and the nephew of Hm͂prãma. And he has established O- ada for the miñti for the allocation. And for the lower chamber III- ada. And he (i.e. the tomb owner) has given the upper chamber to his wife and the consanguineal descendant(s)(?) of Mñneτeide. And he has given the lower chamber to his own household.

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnawu
mene prñnawatẽ
ijetruχle hurttuweteh
wasaza
hrppi ladi
se tideime
seije ñta tetẽ
tesi miñti ada
III
title: TL 38

translations.text: This building has built Ijetruχle, the wasaza of Hurttuwete for wife and children. And they have established III ada for the miñti under oath/by (means of) a sworn agreement.

text:
ebẽñnẽ prñnawu meti prñnawatẽ
mẽmruwi χñtenubeh tideimi
hrppi esedeñnewi χñnahi
ehbijehi se θurttãi lada señne sm͂mati
tijãi kbijehis meñne nijesu
esedeñnewi epttehi ñtepitane
seije ñta tãtẽ tesi miñti
aladahali ada: |||
title: TL 39

translations.text: This building has built Mẽmruwi, the son of Χñtenube, for the consanguineal descendants(?) of his grandmother and for θurttas' wifes. And the payers(?) shall may bind(?)/enjoin(?) those of others to/on them. And it should not be (allowed) to them to place inside their consanguineal descendants(?). And they have established under oath/by (means of) a sworn agreement for the miñti (namely) for the allocation(?) III ada.

text: ebẽñnẽ: xupã: meti prñnawatẽ: tuwala: hrppi ladi se tideime: seije ñtadẽ: tesi: miñti: aladahali: ada: ||
title: TL 42a

translations.text: This tomb has built Tuwala for wife and children. And he has established II ada under oath/by (means of) a sworn contract for the miñti, (namely) for (the purpose of) the allocation(?).

text:
ebẽñnẽ xupu mẽti [p]rñnaw[a]tẽ hura
ikezi hrppi ladi ehbi se tideime seije
ñte tadẽ tesi miñti ada ||-)
title: TL 47

translations.text: This tomb has built Hura, the ikezi/the one of Ikos(?) for his wife and the children. And he has established under oath/by (means of) a sworn contract for the miñti II-) ada.

ebẽñnẽ: xupu: meti: prñnawatẽ: idamaχzza: uherijeh 
tideimi: hrppi ladi ehbi: se tideime sei pijẽtẽ
pijatu: miñti: ẽtri: χupu: siχli: aladehχχãne: se hrzzi
tupm͂me: siχla: hrzzi prñnawi: mei: ñtepi tãti
idãmaxzzã: se l[adu ehbi s]e[ije] n[e hrppi tã]ti tike
kbi: hrppijemei: tadi: tike: mene: tubeiti: mãhãi
huwedri: se itlehi: trm͂mili: ebidalahaditi: ebei: ñte
title: TL 57

translations.text: This tomb has built Idamaχzza, the son of Uherije for his wife and the children. And they have given a gift/fee/charge/delivery(?) to the minti (in order) to make the lower chamber ready for allocation(?) for (one) shekel and the upper for two(?) shekels. And inside the upper chamber they will/shall place Idamaχzza and wife. ... A]nd [they] will/shall not place anyone else [on top/in addition]. (If) one places anyone on top/in addition, then all(?) the gods will strike him and the Lycian itlehi - or who assigns(?) (anyone) thereon(?) inside this place.

text:
esedeplẽmeje: mejadẽ: tesi: miñti
awahai: xupa: ehbi seine: epñ: puñtẽ
mei: [a]wahi: tesi: aladahali -)
title: TL 114

translations.text: On behalf of Esedeplẽmi the minti has made an oath/sworn agreement with regard to the one who lets down/inters(?) in this tomb. And afterwards they enrolled/admitted him (i.e. Esedeplẽmi). And for him, (namely) for the one who lets down/inters(?) (they have established) under oath/by (means of) the sworn agreement for the allocation -> (ada).

title: TL 149

translations.text: This building has built Ijamara, the son of Terssiχle, the priest of the animal sacrifice for Malija of Rhodiapolis (?). And the household and the city (regularly) give (lit. "gives") (the amount of) ada (as agreed upon). And they do (lit. "it does") not (regularly) give for/to/in this district(?) access(?). ANd they shall not place anyone on top of him, (namely) on Ijamara or his wife. Should anyone place anyone else on to[p of him] by (means of) harm(?), a household member or] anyone of another (household) - (on him will be) the wrath of the anabahe and [...] of Rhodiapolis(?). ... As a fine(?) on the whole(?) 10(?) cow(s) and ... sheep. And the Lycian oath gods will destroy him [...] and the itlehi(?) of the totality(?). And the [household] and the city shall sacrifice every year to Malija of Rhodiapolis(?) fo[r] (the benefit of) ... And I made for/to her/him/therein, (namely) for/to ijas(?) this temenos(?) and I gave x[...] for/to the four minti. And they maza(i) for themselves the district(?). x ... to place anyone else on top of the place [a]nd here [...] every year in this sacred(?) district(?) (the(?)/a(?)) hrppe-? and I gave meipeme to sacrifice xxx for/to them.
